attributes.action: ban the use of the Mosquito Device and other similar items in accordance  with the Convention on the Rights of the child.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: The JNE Marketed Mosquito Device shrilly buzzes in only the ears of youths under around 25. This is detrimental to childrens mental and social development, and should be banned in accordance with the Convention on the Rights of the Child (specifically Article 27 Paragraph 1).
